name: Confedratia Nationala a Sindicatelor libere din Romania - Fratia
goal: Apararea drepturilor economice si sociale ale salariatior din federatiile si sindicatele nationale care formeaza Confederatia
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Regional Policy, Taxation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Politici sociale
Dezvoltare economica si ocupare
Educatia adultilor
